Module oitkmg.project4.project4
Package oitkmg.project4

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
oitkmg.project4.Pizza
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BBQChicken, BuildYourOwn, Deluxe, Meatzza
public abstract class Pizza extends Object implements Customizable
Abstract class Pizza that all pizza types must extend.
Author:
Kevin George, Omar Talaat
